item.description:
Greeting to all my fellow Hartford Professionals. I am proud to announce the launch of our first initial meeting as group. As you know I host another meetup group in New Haven Connecticut - The Urban Professionals Network (ctupn.com). In order to start of the meetups on the right foot...I have decided to combine both meetup groups for the first event of the season.


Now that the cold weather, ice storms, and snow is pretty much behind us....Urban Professionals from across the state will meet downtown New Haven at one of our top venues - The Blue Pearl . Smooth Jazz & R&B, Light appetizers, Business giveaways, and great networking opportunities. This event is a FREE event so feel free to invite friends & co-workers. Click Here to register and have a chance to win free membership & door prizes.

I understand New Haven isn't the closest to Hartford, however this will give us a chance to interact and network at a higher level. There will be professionals from New Haven County and Fairfield County and eastern Connecticut. After this first event, I will work with some in Hartford to launch our first Hartford event.

For any concerns our questions please email me.

Jason
info@ctupn.com
item.name: Hartford Black Professionals March Meetup
